content.text: Analyze this construction safety video and return strict JSON with keys incident_type, safety_status, probability, safety_response, action_plan. Reply with JSON only.

response: {"incident_type": "PPE Violation (Missing/Incorrect)", "safety_status": "HIGH", "probability": 0.85, "safety_response": "Require all workers to wear proper PPE, specifically hard hats, at all times while on the construction site, including designated break areas, unless in a fully enclosed and hazard-free environment. Conduct an immediate safety briefing to reinforce continuous PPE use.", "action_plan": "NOTIFY_SUPERVISOR"}

content.text: Analyze this construction safety video and return strict JSON with keys incident_type, safety_status, probability, safety_response, action_plan. Reply with JSON only.

response: {"incident_type": "Fall Hazard (Height)", "safety_status": "EXTREME", "probability": 1.0, "safety_response": "Immediately call 911 for emergency medical services. Secure the area around the roof opening to prevent further falls. Do not attempt rescue without proper training and equipment. Conduct a thorough investigation into the cause of the roof collapse and implement immediate measures to prevent recurrence, including comprehensive roof integrity inspections and fall protection for all elevated work.", "action_plan": "SHUTDOWN_EQUIPMENT"}

content.text: Analyze this construction safety video and return strict JSON with keys incident_type, safety_status, probability, safety_response, action_plan. Reply with JSON only.

response: {"incident_type": "Fire/Explosion Hazard", "safety_status": "EXTREME", "probability": 1.0, "safety_response": "An active electrical fire is occurring. Immediately call 911 for emergency services and the fire department. Ensure all personnel are evacuated from the area. Once the fire is extinguished and the area is safe, conduct a thorough investigation into the cause of the electrical overload and fire, and implement strict electrical safety protocols, including proper circuit loading, use of appropriate power strips, and regular inspection of electrical equipment and wiring.", "action_plan": "EVACUATE"}

response: {"incident_type": "Crush/Proximity Hazard (Blind Spot)", "safety_status": "HIGH", "probability": 0.8, "safety_response": "Immediately stop all equipment movement. Instruct the worker to put away their phone and maintain situational awareness around heavy machinery. Reinforce 'no phone while walking' policy on site and ensure proper spotter procedures are followed when equipment is operating in areas with pedestrian traffic.", "action_plan": "NOTIFY_SUPERVISOR"}

response: {"incident_type": "Fire/Explosion Hazard", "safety_status": "HIGH", "probability": 0.85, "safety_response": "Immediately stop all refueling operations and shut down the generator if safe to do so. Ensure workers are trained in safe refueling procedures and spill response.", "action_plan": "EVACUATE"}

content.text: Analyze this construction safety video and return strict JSON with keys incident_type, safety_status, probability, safety_response, action_plan. Reply with JSON only.

response: {"incident_type": "Fall Hazard (Height)", "safety_status": "EXTREME", "probability": 1.0, "safety_response": "Immediately call 911 for emergency medical services for the injured worker. Secure the area. Conduct a thorough incident investigation to determine the root cause of the ladder slip, including proper ladder placement, angle, stability on wet surfaces, and worker behavior (overreaching). Implement immediate retraining on ladder safety, emphasizing the 3-point contact rule, proper ladder setup on stable and dry surfaces, securing the ladder, and avoiding overreaching. Consider alternative elevated work platforms for tasks requiring extended reach or working on unstable ground.", "action_plan": "SHUTDOWN_EQUIPMENT"}

response: {"incident_type": "Equipment Instability/Tip-over Risk", "safety_status": "EXTREME", "probability": 1.0, "safety_response": "Immediately call 911 for emergency services (fire department and ambulance). Secure the area to prevent further collapse or injury. Do not attempt to rescue without proper training and equipment. Assess workers for injuries and provide first aid if safe to do so. Investigate the cause of the tip-over, including improper placement of the lift near an excavation and potential overloading or improper operation. Reinforce training on safe operation of aerial work platforms, especially near trenches and unstable ground.", "action_plan": "SHUTDOWN_EQUIPMENT"}

response: {"incident_type": "Heat/Cold Stress", "safety_status": "HIGH", "probability": 0.9, "safety_response": "Immediately extract the worker from the confined space. Assess for heat exhaustion/stroke and provide first aid or call for medical assistance (ambulance) if necessary. Do not allow the worker to continue working while experiencing these symptoms. Review confined space entry procedures and heat stress prevention protocols for all workers.", "action_plan": "NOTIFY_SUPERVISOR"}

content.text: Analyze this construction safety video and return strict JSON with keys incident_type, safety_status, probability, safety_response, action_plan. Reply with JSON only.

response: {"incident_type": "Unsecured Working Platform", "safety_status": "EXTREME", "probability": 1.0, "safety_response": "Immediately stop all work on the scaffold. Provide urgent medical attention to the injured worker. Secure the area below the scaffold to prevent further dropped object injuries. Conduct a thorough inspection of the scaffold to ensure it is fully decked, properly secured, and has adequate guardrails and toe boards. Retrain all workers on scaffold safety, fall protection, and proper material handling. Implement a strict scaffold inspection protocol before each shift.", "action_plan": "SHUTDOWN_EQUIPMENT"}

Conduct a thorough investigation into the incident and provide retraining for all personnel on hazard identification and safe operating procedures.", "action_plan": "SHUTDOWN_EQUIPMENT"}

content.text: Analyze this construction safety video and return strict JSON with keys incident_type, safety_status, probability, safety_response, action_plan. Reply with JSON only.

response: {"incident_type": "Medical Emergency - First Aid/Ambulance", "safety_status": "EXTREME", "probability": 1.0, "safety_response": "Immediately call emergency medical services (911). Provide first aid and move the worker to a cooler, shaded area if safe to do so. Monitor vital signs. All work should cease until the worker is attended to and the site's heat stress protocols are reviewed and reinforced. Implement mandatory hydration breaks, provide cooling stations, and adjust work schedules to avoid peak heat hours. Educate all workers on heat stress symptoms and prevention.", "action_plan": "CALL_EMS"}

response: {"incident_type": "Caught-in/Caught-between Machinery", "safety_status": "HIGH", "probability": 0.8, "safety_response": "Implement strict lockout/tagout procedures and ensure proper guarding is in place for the press brake machine. Mandate the use of two-hand controls or light curtains to prevent hands from entering the pinch point during operation. Conduct a thorough review of safe operating procedures and provide refresher training to all operators.", "action_plan": "NOTIFY_SUPERVISOR"}
